recipes.name: recipe-8-hour-lamb-shoulder.md
recipes.title: 8 hour lamb shoulder
recipes.summary: Delicious melt in the mouth lamb dish.

recipes.name: recipe-northern-irish-vegetable-soup.md
recipes.title: Northern irish vegetable soup
recipes.summary: This recipe is apparently unique to Northern Ireland and uses soup/herb celery which is hard to find outside the area, but regular table celery can be substituted (including the leaves).

recipes.name: recipe-super-simple-guacamole.md
recipes.title: Super simple guacamole
recipes.summary: Some guacamole recipes call for many ingredients and can be a pain to prepare.  This super simple guac can be thrown together in a couple of minutes and tastes great.
